name: Mokemon Mystery Dungeon
description:
After falling asleep, you awaken in an unfamiliar forest and discover that you've turned into a Mokemon! Two strange Mokemon find you and want to recruit you as a member of their rescue team.  Will you accept? Find out what adventures await you in the world of Mokemon Mystery Dungeon!

(This is just a brief prototype, and unfortunately I don't have any plans to further this project past the prologue as it was mostly a test run of my coding and pixel art skills. It was incredibly fun to make though!)

---------------------------------------------------
